content: Suggest to remove the tag "Nested loops" as it is covered by the tag "Loops", and this puzzle is the only one tagged "Nested loops".

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Its a very good puzzle
I spend some time figuring out how to decrease computation time. Very fun problem! The statement is also very clear.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun problem.
The fact that it's a conjecture that there is a solution makes it even more interesting.
Maybe you can remove the <<Line 1>> from input and output since there's only one line. Also n is positive in missing from the Constraints.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I approve. A completely straightforward solution causes a timeout. You need to think a little.
Maybe it is worth pointing out that Zhiwei Sun is the name of a mathematician?
OK I'll put it in a note of interest.

That would make sense if there was a clear strategy for tagging, but the current tags are fairly arbitrary and not clearly defined or delineated. "Nested loops" isn't official and doesn't show up as a tag for this puzzle, but I contend that it should. In fact, there should be a lot more puzzles with this tag. If anything, "Loops" should be removed and reserved for simpler puzzles. I had only tagged this puzzle "Loops" because "Nested loops" wasn't an option. Tagging is something I hoped to be able to tackle upon reaching level 29. You can imagine my disappointment. If it's a lost cause, why wouldn't I just as well remove all tags from my puzzles? Sorry for the pessimism. If you still feel there's a good reason, then sure.
I don't quite understand your message. If you don't mind it, you may send me a private message on the forum and we can discuss further there.
